metadata.title: Oinsi Sun- Stainless Steel Round Shape Cremation Urn Necklace Locket Pendant Ash Jewelry for Men Women
features: 1.Premium Grade Stainless Steel pendant &chain will never rust, corrode, rust or stain. Screw & rubber gasket secures a tight seal to keep your pet or human urn ashes.Anti-perspiration, waterproof, durable, fadeless, allergy free,nickel free
2.Select healthy and durable stainless steel as material, 100% water resistant.This jewelry is perfect to memorialize your loved one forever and keep your loved one close to your heart at all times
3.Wonderful keepsakes and memorials, keep memories of your loved ones near to your heart

4.Can be Engraved. Hand crafted Urn Necklace, Cremation Jewelry ,memorial jewelry, or remembrance jewelry is used as a remarkable way to memorialize a loved one. It is available in the form of pendants, rings, bracelets, necklaces, lockets, etc.
5.Free 20" Chain with Extension chain,Exquisite gift box and Filling kit ,With our miniature funnel & sturdy steel pin, you can steadily & easily fill the heart.
description: Description *100% Stainless steel and high quality. *Impressive craftsmanship,product quality guarantee. *Reasonable price,safty sale and delivery management. *Including one gift box,chain and funnel kits suitable as a gift!
